meta.title: Home - Spring-Ford Area School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

input.name: q
input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

div.div: Vision: Spring-Ford Area School District will be the district that every parent would choose as their child's educational provider.
Spring-Ford’s nine school directors assess the district’s needs to develop an educational program that is consistent with the districts mission and vision.

Mission: Spring-Ford Area School District strives to be educationally relevant, focused on achievement and growth, and have a priority on people so that students are fully prepared to positively contribute to their society.

li.a: Spring City Elementary Hybrid Learning School

div.div: Visual arts, drama, athletics, after school activities, music and more. Extracurricular activities exist for all Spring-Ford students to succeed outside of the school day.
Dropdown content text. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur. Nullam quis risus eget urna mollis ornare vel eu leo.

header.div: Learn more about becoming a volunteer!

div.a: Athletic Click here for Athletic information.
Employment Click here for Employment information.
Registration Click here for New Student Registration.
S2SS Click here to submit a referral.

div.class: fsElement fsNews fsList home-news-module tab1 active fsItemCount_4 fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailMedium

div.p: Starting Monday, March 30th teachers will be providing new instruction online using Google Classroom with the intent of advancing and moving the curriculum forward. Please know that we understand that this is going to be a transition for families, and we are stressing flexibility for families. Instruction will be asynchronous, which means that families will have flexibility as to when in the day they will complete their work. Please click here to review the Instructional Continuation Plan.

article.a: Continue Reading » about Instructional Continuation Plan

p.a: Click here for the March 4, 2020 Weekly Update.

article.a: Continue Reading » about Weekly Update: COVID-19 Information

div.p: Click here to read the weekly update - don't miss the upcoming Spring Musical or the annual Spring-Ford 5K Run/Walk!

article.a: Continue Reading » about Weekly Update: Spring Musical, 5K + More!

p.a: Click here to read the Weekly Update with information about the VEX Robotics Competition, RAMcast, and more!

article.a: Continue Reading » about Weekly Update: VEX Robotic Competition!

div.class: fsElement fsNews fsList home-news-module tab2 fsItemCount_4 fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailMedium

article.a: Continue Reading » about COLOR ME FUN RUN

div.p: RCTV is a channel just for the residents of the Spring-Ford Area School District. Comcast customers can tune into Channel 969 and Verizon customers can tune into Channel 44.

857 South Lewis Road, Royersford, PA 19468-2732
610-705-6000 610-705-6245
news@spring-ford.net
